text: The Grasshopper and the Ant () is a 1913 Russian animated movie directed by Ladislas Starevich.Москино представит программу "Дрессировщики жуков. Насекомые в анимации"СТРЕКОЗА И МУРАВЕЙ (1913) The movie is based on a fable by I. Krylov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:1913 movies
title: The Grasshopper and the Ant (1913 movie)
